instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: Hi guys working on a 820-3115 unit turns on but no chime tried pram reset and still no chime changed speaker too any ideas what can cause this problem

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: I ran the hardware test and it passed. Would it have failed if cpu vcore was missing?

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: Sorry, I absolutely misunderstood the question..... :o:o....  Do you have sound on OS?? check right speaker connector...

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: I'm getting no speaker audio I checked power to audio chip and is getting power any ideas no water damage in that area

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: Do you have audio in headphone??? If yes, replace headphones jack....

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: Is output device recognized on OS??

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: Yes now here is the weird thing, I was poking around the audio chip and got sound when I tried the headphone no sound I restarted the computer and then sound was gone again

threads.title: 820-3115 No Chime Turns on and works
threads.message: Check all power at the codec chip and the 4.5V from U6200 to the codec. L6200 and 6201 are suspect.
